review:
I had a severe pain in my left shoulder following a gym injury, I was supposed to go under surgery. But I decided to take another opinion and after seeing reviews called Dr Amit. 
He asked me to come quickly to his clinic. He advised and gave me medications and helped me with the pain. Itâ€™s an ongoing treatment but still I am hopeful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My mother had a grade 3 tier and doctor from an another hospital had suggested to go for a surgery. At this age going for a ligament surgery is it self a area of concern. A friend of mine suggested Dr. Amit Kumar Agarwal and we went for a second opinion to him. He explained the problem very peacefully and diagnosed another alignment. He strongly recommend vitamins and take physiotherapy sessions. My motherâ€™s pain has reduced and she has stared going for walks again.This has been only possible due to the guidance of Dr. Amit. Thank you sir for your help and support.
reply_text: Good to know about the recovery of your mother and thank you for sharing your experience and excellent feedback.

review: I've been visiting Dr.(Prof) Amit Kumar Agarwal for sometime now regarding my pain issues and my mother's knee problems as well and he has always explained everything properly and treated us very efficiently without prescribing a lot of unnecessary tests or expensive medicines and we have been getting great results. He's a very calm professional punctual and helpful human being exactly like a doctor should be. Highly recommended.
reply_text: Thank you very much for your excellent feedback

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
i am Riad Ahmad. From 1 year i am facing left hip joint pain(AVN). After visiting with Dr. Amit Kumar Sir, he advised no need to do total hip replacement. By core decompression surgery+BMAC it's possible to recovery or can delay damage of hip.
Although in previous many doctor's advised to me replace total hip joint.

My surgery done in mid December, now i am feel good. 
As per my experienced Dr. Amit Kumar sir is most experienced, friendly, well behave & responsible doctor. 
Truely speeking i am highly satisfied of his treatment.
reply_text: Thank you for your excellent feedback..wishing you speedy recovery.
